1448210.name: Becloudead Holidays Specials
1448210.description:
Becloudead is a horror story driven, hack and slash cinematic platformer, set in a post-apocalyptic world plagued by a zombie virus. Featuring close combat fighting with a unique time based modular combo system, puzzle solving, nerve-racking boss fights and more...

These demos were made specially for Halloween, Christmas and Easter and do not represent the final product.
